TRAXIONA.MX.summary: Grupo TraxiÃ³n, S.A.B. de C.V. operates as a transportation and logistics company in Mexico. It operates in two segments, Cargo and Logistics; and Personnel and Student Transportation. The company provides truckload, less-than-truckload, intermodal, refrigerated freight, and petrochemicals and specialized transportation services; and border transfer, warehouse management, last-mile logistics, moving and relocation, and packaging and courier services. It also offers personnel transportation services to corporates, industrial parks, and hotels; student transportation services to schools and colleges; and tourism services for private groups. In addition, the company rents buses and vans for corporate events, tourism, and special events; and provides advertising solutions. It offers its services under the Transportadora EGOBA, Muebles y Mudanzas MYM, Grupo SID, Auto Express Frontera Norte, Autotransportes El Bisonte, and Redpack brand names. The company was formerly known as Fondo de Transporte MÃ©xico, S.A.P.I. de C.V. and changed its name to Grupo TraxiÃ³n, S.A.B. de C.V. in September 2017. Grupo TraxiÃ³n, S.A.B. de C.V. is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
